doc.field: Fox News Night With Shannon Bream

imagine thank to john kennedy who said we should go to the moon by the end of the decade i think we should go to the moon next month so why are you even calling for that, it's not impressive enough. we need big ideas what they have to be workable. i think you have to answer 3 questions for the american people. is a workable idea, how do you pay for and how do you get it done? i have big ideas for the important issues whether his infrastructure, public education, creating jobs, dealing with climate change, healthcare, all my plans are workable. it people i will pay for them
